# Download: Executes the exams generated by Crisol Mind Web Pro 2010.

**Program name:**

## Crisol Mind Test Player v2010

  
**Thumbshot:** ![](http://www.freewarefiles.com/screenshot/crystlmndtstplyr_md.jpg)   
  
**Download link:** [Download Executes the exams generated by Crisol Mind Web Pro 2010.](http://freesoftwares.boysofts.com/Crisol-Mind-Test-Player_program_62261.html)  
  


**Publisher's Description**  
  


Crisol Mind Test Player executes the exams generated by Crisol Mind Web Pro 2010. Once you get the exam link sent by your teacher or professor, open the Crisol Mind Test Player 2010 application, and on the first page it will ask for the exam link, load it, and you are ready to answer your exam. 

Crisol Mind Test Player can execute four different types of interactive exams: Evaluation, Simulation, Learning mode and Study guide.
